correspAction.placeName: Royal Observatory, Cape of Good Hope

abstract.p: Is grateful for JH's expression of sympathy over the death of his wife. One of his daughters has left on a ship for England. Sends a work by S. Salomon describing the visit of Prince Alfred to the Cape.
